jd: From: sivaji, Headway Tek Inc sivaji@headwaytek.com Reply to: sivaji@headwaytek.com Role: .Net FullStack Lead/ Senior Dotnet Developer with strong C#.net, React and data background experienceYears of Experience: 10+ years MUSTLocation: Arlington, VA (3 days onsite Mandatory) – Need anyone from drivable distance will be given 1st preference (OR) worst case from east coast who can go onsite day1 will be considered. NOTE:Look for candidates with React, Redux, Typescript, SQL Server, Data background - anonymizing data, data product development, analytical models, and AI governance. · Primary skills - NET/C#, React, Redux, Typescript, and SQL Server· 8 years of full stack engineering experience in an agile production environment.· Experience leading the design and implementation of complex features.· Experience leading a large project and working with other data and software engineers.· Experience working in enterprise databases and ensure follow industry best practices around data privacy.· Experience in anonymizing data, data product development, analytical models, and AI governance.· Effective communication and collaboration skills to work with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.· Flexible to work with global offices across several time zones.· Outstanding problem-solving skills and the ability to navigate complex data challenges.· Experience with agile methodologies, DevOps practices, and CI/CD.
